description.narrative: To help creating bottom up response to current food and climate crisis in a way that it addresses root causes of the crisis, it helps building biodiversity-based farming systems, and gives local communities greater say in what should be done. This will be done through production and distribution of in-depth analysis, advocacy and capacity building tools. We propose to focus support from Grassroots international on maintaining and further developing our research, information and outreach work around food and climate crisis, to produce new quality materials that help expanding our user base, including civil society organizations, policy makers and farmers groups
